thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 15 de 669
thread.title: R Karpiak

author: R Karpiak
title: R Karpiak
text:
Overall, the experience was good:
- there was an acceptable car when I arrived to the airport
- there was something unclear about diesel/gasoline but Simona (worker at Goldcar Milano Malpensa) helped to make it clear very quickly
- I took full insurance, so at the end of rental period there were no any problems
- the price was probably the lowest one across all agencies
